title: Transitive relations (not to be confused with transitive classes).

blocks.name: trrelind
blocks.content: The intersection of transitive relations is a transitive relation. (Contributed by Richard Penner, 24-Dec-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm trrelind(class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wss(ccom(c0, c0), c0))
  -| wi(w0, wss(ccom(c1, c1), c1))
  -| wi(w0, wss(ccom(c2, c2), c2))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(c0, cin(c1, c2)))
} = {
  3sstr4d(ccom(c0, c0), c0, ccom(cin(c1, c2), cin(c1, c2)), cin(c1, c2), w0)
  ssind(ccom(cin(c1, c2), cin(c1, c2)), c1, c2, w0)
  trrelssd(cin(c1, c2), cin(c1, c2), c1, w0)
  a1i(w0, wss(cin(c1, c2), c1))
  inss1(c1, c2)
  trrelssd(cin(c1, c2), cin(c1, c2), c2, w0)
  a1i(w0, wss(cin(c1, c2), c2))
  inss2(c1, c2)
  coeq12d(c0, c0, cin(c1, c2), cin(c1, c2), w0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm trrelind(class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(c0 ∘ c0)⊆ c0)
  ⊣ (w0 →(c1 ∘ c1)⊆ c1)
  ⊣ (w0 →(c2 ∘ c2)⊆ c2)
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 =(c1 ⋂ c2))
} = {
  3sstr4d((c0 ∘ c0), c0, ((c1 ⋂ c2)∘(c1 ⋂ c2)), (c1 ⋂ c2), w0)
  ssind(((c1 ⋂ c2)∘(c1 ⋂ c2)), c1, c2, w0)
  trrelssd((c1 ⋂ c2), (c1 ⋂ c2), c1, w0)
  a1i(w0, (c1 ⋂ c2)⊆ c1)
  inss1(c1, c2)
  trrelssd((c1 ⋂ c2), (c1 ⋂ c2), c2, w0)
  a1i(w0, (c1 ⋂ c2)⊆ c2)
  inss2(c1, c2)
  coeq12d(c0, c0, (c1 ⋂ c2), (c1 ⋂ c2), w0)
}

blocks.name: xpintrreld
blocks.content: The intersection of a transitive relation with a cross product is a transitve relation. (Contributed by Richard Penner, 24-Dec-2019.)

blocks.name: restrreld
blocks.content: The restriction of a transitive relation is a transitive relation. (Contributed by Richard Penner, 24-Dec-2019.)

blocks.name: trrelsuperreldg
blocks.content: Concrete construction of a superclass of relation ` R ` which is a transitive relation. (Contributed by Richard Penner, 25-Dec-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm trrelsuperreldg(class c0, class c1, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wa(wss(c0, c1), wss(ccom(c1, c1), c1)))
  -| wi(w0, wrel(c0))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(c1, cxp(cdm(c0), crn(c0))))
} = {
  jca(w0, wss(c0, c1), wss(ccom(c1, c1), c1))
  sseqtr4d(c0, c1, cxp(cdm(c0), crn(c0)), w0)
  syl(w0, wss(c0, cxp(cdm(c0), crn(c0))), wrel(c0))
  relssdmrn(c0)
  3sstr4d(ccom(c1, c1), c1, ccom(cxp(cdm(c0), crn(c0)), cxp(cdm(c0), crn(c0))), cxp(cdm(c0), crn(c0)), w0)
  a1i(w0, wss(ccom(cxp(cdm(c0), crn(c0)), cxp(cdm(c0), crn(c0))), cxp(cdm(c0), crn(c0))))
  xptrrel(cdm(c0), crn(c0))
  coeq12d(c1, c1, cxp(cdm(c0), crn(c0)), cxp(cdm(c0), crn(c0)), w0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm trrelsuperreldg(class c0, class c1, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(c0 ⊆ c1 ∧(c1 ∘ c1)⊆ c1))
  ⊣ (w0 → Rel(c0))
  ⊣ (w0 → c1 =(dom(c0)× ran(c0)))
} = {
  jca(w0, c0 ⊆ c1, (c1 ∘ c1)⊆ c1)
  sseqtr4d(c0, c1, (dom(c0)× ran(c0)), w0)
  syl(w0, c0 ⊆(dom(c0)× ran(c0)), Rel(c0))
  relssdmrn(c0)
  3sstr4d((c1 ∘ c1), c1, ((dom(c0)× ran(c0))∘(dom(c0)× ran(c0))), (dom(c0)× ran(c0)), w0)
  a1i(w0, ((dom(c0)× ran(c0))∘(dom(c0)× ran(c0)))⊆(dom(c0)× ran(c0)))
  xptrrel(dom(c0), ran(c0))
  coeq12d(c1, c1, (dom(c0)× ran(c0)), (dom(c0)× ran(c0)), w0)
}

blocks.name: trficl
blocks.content: The class of all transitive relations has the finite intersection property. (Contributed by Richard Penner, 1-Jan-2020.) (Proof shortened by Richard Penner, 3-Jan-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm trficl(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0) {
  |- wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, c0, wcel(cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c0)))
  -| wceq(c0, cab(s2, wss(ccom(cv(s2), cv(s2)), cv(s2))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
} = {
  cllem0(s0, s1, s2, c0, cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)), universe, wss(ccom(cv(s2), cv(s2)), cv(s2)), wss(ccom(cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cin(cv(s0), cv(s1))), cin(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wss(ccom(cv(s0), cv(s0)), cv(s0)), wss(ccom(cv(s1), cv(s1)), cv(s1)))
  inex1(cv(s0), cv(s1))
  vex(s0)
  sseq12d(ccom(cv(s2), cv(s2)), cv(s2), ccom(cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cin(cv(s0), cv(s1))), cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wceq(cv(s2), cin(cv(s0), cv(s1))))
  coeq12d(cv(s2), cv(s2), cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wceq(cv(s2), cin(cv(s0), cv(s1))))
  id(wceq(cv(s2), cin(cv(s0), cv(s1))))
  sseq12d(ccom(cv(s2), cv(s2)), cv(s2), ccom(cv(s0), cv(s0)), cv(s0), wceq(cv(s2), cv(s0)))
  coeq12d(cv(s2), cv(s2), cv(s0), cv(s0), wceq(cv(s2), cv(s0)))
  id(wceq(cv(s2), cv(s0)))
  sseq12d(ccom(cv(s2), cv(s2)), cv(s2), ccom(cv(s1), cv(s1)), cv(s1), wceq(cv(s2), cv(s1)))
  coeq12d(cv(s2), cv(s2), cv(s1), cv(s1), wceq(cv(s2), cv(s1)))
  id(wceq(cv(s2), cv(s1)))
  trin2(cv(s0), cv(s1))
  diff.wss.s(s2, ccom(cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cin(cv(s0), cv(s1))), cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)))
  diff.ccom.s(s2, cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)))
  diff.cin.s(s2, cv(s0), cv(s1))
  diff.wss.s(s2, ccom(cv(s0), cv(s0)), cv(s0))
  diff.ccom.s(s2, cv(s0), cv(s0))
  diff.cv.s(s2, s0)
  diffss.ex(s2, s0)
  diff.wss.s(s2, ccom(cv(s1), cv(s1)), cv(s1))
  diff.ccom.s(s2, cv(s1), cv(s1))
  diff.cv.s(s2, s1)
  diffss.ex(s2, s1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm trficl(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0) {
  ⊢ ∀(s0 ∈ c0, ∀(s1 ∈ c0,(s0 ⋂ s1)∈ c0))
  ⊣ c0 = { s2 |(s2 ∘ s2)⊆ s2 }
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, s2)
  ⊣ d(s1, s2)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
} = {
  cllem0(s0, s1, s2, c0, (s0 ⋂ s1), universe, (s2 ∘ s2)⊆ s2, ((s0 ⋂ s1)∘(s0 ⋂ s1))⊆(s0 ⋂ s1), (s0 ∘ s0)⊆ s0, (s1 ∘ s1)⊆ s1)
  inex1(s0, s1)
  vex(s0)
  sseq12d((s2 ∘ s2), s2, ((s0 ⋂ s1)∘(s0 ⋂ s1)), (s0 ⋂ s1), s2 =(s0 ⋂ s1))
  coeq12d(s2, s2, (s0 ⋂ s1), (s0 ⋂ s1), s2 =(s0 ⋂ s1))
  id(s2 =(s0 ⋂ s1))
  sseq12d((s2 ∘ s2), s2, (s0 ∘ s0), s0, s2 = s0)
  coeq12d(s2, s2, s0, s0, s2 = s0)
  id(s2 = s0)
  sseq12d((s2 ∘ s2), s2, (s1 ∘ s1), s1, s2 = s1)
  coeq12d(s2, s2, s1, s1, s2 = s1)
  id(s2 = s1)
  trin2(s0, s1)
  diff.wss.s(s2, ((s0 ⋂ s1)∘(s0 ⋂ s1)), (s0 ⋂ s1))
  diff.ccom.s(s2, (s0 ⋂ s1), (s0 ⋂ s1))
  diff.cin.s(s2, s0, s1)
  diff.wss.s(s2, (s0 ∘ s0), s0)
  diff.ccom.s(s2, s0, s0)
  diff.cv.s(s2, s0)
  diffss.ex(s2, s0)
  diff.wss.s(s2, (s1 ∘ s1), s1)
  diff.ccom.s(s2, s1, s1)
  diff.cv.s(s2, s1)
  diffss.ex(s2, s1)
}

blocks.name: cnvtrrel
blocks.content: The converse of a transitive relation is a transitive relation. (Contributed by Richard Penner, 25-Dec-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm cnvtrrel(class c0) {
  |- wb(wss(ccom(c0, c0), c0), wss(ccom(ccnv(c0), ccnv(c0)), ccnv(c0)))
} = {
  bitri(wss(ccom(c0, c0), c0), wss(ccom(ccnv(c0), ccnv(c0)), ccnv(c0)), wss(ccnv(ccom(c0, c0)), ccnv(c0)))
  impbii(wss(ccom(c0, c0), c0), wss(ccnv(ccom(c0, c0)), ccnv(c0)))
  cnvss(ccom(c0, c0), c0)
  syl(wss(ccnv(ccom(c0, c0)), ccnv(c0)), wss(ccom(c0, c0), c0), wss(ccnv(ccnv(ccom(c0, c0))), ccnv(ccnv(c0))))
  cnvss(ccnv(ccom(c0, c0)), ccnv(c0))
  syl6ss(ccom(c0, c0), c0, ccnv(ccnv(c0)), wss(ccnv(ccnv(ccom(c0, c0))), ccnv(ccnv(c0))))
  biimpi(wss(ccnv(ccnv(ccom(c0, c0))), ccnv(ccnv(c0))), wss(ccom(c0, c0), ccnv(ccnv(c0))))
  sseq1i(ccnv(ccnv(ccom(c0, c0))), ccnv(ccnv(c0)), ccom(c0, c0))
  3eqtri(ccnv(ccnv(ccom(c0, c0))), ccom(c0, c0), ccnv(ccom(ccnv(c0), ccnv(c0))), ccom(ccnv(ccnv(c0)), ccnv(ccnv(c0))))
  cnveqi(ccnv(ccom(c0, c0)), ccom(ccnv(c0), ccnv(c0)))
  cnvco(ccnv(c0), ccnv(c0))
  eqtri(ccom(ccnv(ccnv(c0)), ccnv(ccnv(c0))), ccom(c0, c0), ccom(c0, ccnv(ccnv(c0))))
  cocnvcnv1(c0, ccnv(ccnv(c0)))
  cocnvcnv2(c0, c0)
  cnvcnvss(c0)
  sseq1i(ccnv(ccom(c0, c0)), ccnv(c0), ccom(ccnv(c0), ccnv(c0)))
  cnvco(c0, c0)
}

blocks.name: trrelsuperrel2dg
blocks.content: Concrete construction of a superclass of relation ` R ` which is a transitive relation. (Contributed by RP, 20-Jul-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm trrelsuperrel2dg(class c0, class c1, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wa(wss(c0, c1), wss(ccom(c1, c1), c1)))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(c1, cun(c0, cxp(cdm(c0), crn(c0)))))
} = {
  jca(w0, wss(c0, c1), wss(ccom(c1, c1), c1))
  syl5sseqr(c0, c1, cun(c0, cxp(cdm(c0), crn(c0))), w0)
  ssun1(c0, cxp(cdm(c0), crn(c0)))
  3sstr4d(ccom(c1, c1), c1, ccom(cxp(cdm(c0), crn(c0)), cxp(cdm(c0), crn(c0))), cun(c0, cxp(cdm(c0), crn(c0))), w0)
  a1i(w0, wss(ccom(cxp(cdm(c0), crn(c0)), cxp(cdm(c0), crn(c0))), cun(c0, cxp(cdm(c0), crn(c0)))))
  sstri(ccom(cxp(cdm(c0), crn(c0)), cxp(cdm(c0), crn(c0))), cun(c0, cxp(cdm(c0), crn(c0))), cxp(cdm(c0), crn(c0)))
  xptrrel(cdm(c0), crn(c0))
  ssun2(cxp(cdm(c0), crn(c0)), c0)
  syl6eq(ccom(c1, c1), ccom(cxp(cdm(c0), crn(c0)), cxp(cdm(c0), crn(c0))), ccom(cun(c0, cxp(cdm(c0), crn(c0))), cun(c0, cxp(cdm(c0), crn(c0)))), w0)
  coeq12d(c1, c1, cun(c0, cxp(cdm(c0), crn(c0))), cun(c0, cxp(cdm(c0), crn(c0))), w0)
  eqtri(ccom(cun(c0, cxp(cdm(c0), crn(c0))), cun(c0, cxp(cdm(c0), crn(c0)))), ccom(cxp(cdm(c0), crn(c0)), cxp(cdm(c0), crn(c0))), ccom(cxp(cdm(c0), crn(c0)), cun(c0, cxp(cdm(c0), crn(c0)))))
  eqtri(ccom(cun(c0, cxp(cdm(c0), crn(c0))), cun(c0, cxp(cdm(c0), crn(c0)))), ccom(cxp(cdm(c0), crn(c0)), cun(c0, cxp(cdm(c0), crn(c0)))), cun(ccom(c0, cun(c0, cxp(cdm(c0), crn(c0)))), ccom(cxp(cdm(c0), crn(c0)), cun(c0, cxp(cdm(c0), crn(c0))))))
  coundir(c0, cxp(cdm(c0), crn(c0)), cun(c0, cxp(cdm(c0), crn(c0))))
  ax-mp(wceq(cun(ccom(c0, cun(c0, cxp(cdm(c0), crn(c0)))), ccom(cxp(cdm(c0), crn(c0)), cun(c0, cxp(cdm(c0), crn(c0))))), ccom(cxp(cdm(c0), crn(c0)), cun(c0, cxp(cdm(c0), crn(c0))))), wrel(ccnv(ccnv(c0))))
  sylib(wrel(ccnv(ccnv(c0))), wceq(cun(ccom(c0, cun(c0, cxp(cdm(c0), crn(c0)))), ccom(cxp(cdm(c0), crn(c0)), cun(c0, cxp(cdm(c0), crn(c0))))), ccom(cxp(cdm(c0), crn(c0)), cun(c0, cxp(cdm(c0), crn(c0))))), wss(ccom(c0, cun(c0, cxp(cdm(c0), crn(c0)))), ccom(cxp(cdm(c0), crn(c0)), cun(c0, cxp(cdm(c0), crn(c0))))))
  syl5eqssr(ccom(c0, cun(c0, cxp(cdm(c0), crn(c0)))), ccom(cxp(cdm(c0), crn(c0)), cun(c0, cxp(cdm(c0), crn(c0)))), ccom(ccnv(ccnv(c0)), cun(c0, cxp(cdm(c0), crn(c0)))), wrel(ccnv(ccnv(c0))))
  cocnvcnv1(c0, cun(c0, cxp(cdm(c0), crn(c0))))
  syl(wrel(ccnv(ccnv(c0))), wss(ccom(ccnv(ccnv(c0)), cun(c0, cxp(cdm(c0), crn(c0)))), ccom(cxp(cdm(c0), crn(c0)), cun(c0, cxp(cdm(c0), crn(c0))))), wss(ccnv(ccnv(c0)), cxp(cdm(c0), crn(c0))))
  coss1(ccnv(ccnv(c0)), cxp(cdm(c0), crn(c0)), cun(c0, cxp(cdm(c0), crn(c0))))
  ssequn1(ccom(c0, cun(c0, cxp(cdm(c0), crn(c0)))), ccom(cxp(cdm(c0), crn(c0)), cun(c0, cxp(cdm(c0), crn(c0)))))
  eqtri(ccom(cxp(cdm(c0), crn(c0)), cun(c0, cxp(cdm(c0), crn(c0)))), ccom(cxp(cdm(c0), crn(c0)), cxp(cdm(c0), crn(c0))), cun(ccom(cxp(cdm(c0), crn(c0)), c0), ccom(cxp(cdm(c0), crn(c0)), cxp(cdm(c0), crn(c0)))))
  coundi(cxp(cdm(c0), crn(c0)), c0, cxp(cdm(c0), crn(c0)))
  ax-mp(wceq(cun(ccom(cxp(cdm(c0), crn(c0)), c0), ccom(cxp(cdm(c0), crn(c0)), cxp(cdm(c0), crn(c0)))), ccom(cxp(cdm(c0), crn(c0)), cxp(cdm(c0), crn(c0)))), wrel(ccnv(ccnv(c0))))
  relcnv(ccnv(c0))
  sylib(wrel(ccnv(ccnv(c0))), wceq(cun(ccom(cxp(cdm(c0), crn(c0)), c0), ccom(cxp(cdm(c0), crn(c0)), cxp(cdm(c0), crn(c0)))), ccom(cxp(cdm(c0), crn(c0)), cxp(cdm(c0), crn(c0)))), wss(ccom(cxp(cdm(c0), crn(c0)), c0), ccom(cxp(cdm(c0), crn(c0)), cxp(cdm(c0), crn(c0)))))
  syl5eqssr(ccom(cxp(cdm(c0), crn(c0)), c0), ccom(cxp(cdm(c0), crn(c0)), cxp(cdm(c0), crn(c0))), ccom(cxp(cdm(c0), crn(c0)), ccnv(ccnv(c0))), wrel(ccnv(ccnv(c0))))
  cocnvcnv2(cxp(cdm(c0), crn(c0)), c0)
  syl(wrel(ccnv(ccnv(c0))), wss(ccom(cxp(cdm(c0), crn(c0)), ccnv(ccnv(c0))), ccom(cxp(cdm(c0), crn(c0)), cxp(cdm(c0), crn(c0)))), wss(ccnv(ccnv(c0)), cxp(cdm(c0), crn(c0))))
  syl6sseq(ccnv(ccnv(c0)), cxp(cdm(c0), crn(c0)), cxp(cdm(ccnv(ccnv(c0))), crn(ccnv(ccnv(c0)))), wrel(ccnv(ccnv(c0))))
  relssdmrn(ccnv(ccnv(c0)))
  xpeq12i(cdm(ccnv(ccnv(c0))), crn(ccnv(ccnv(c0))), cdm(c0), crn(c0))
  dmcnvcnv(c0)
  rncnvcnv(c0)
  coss2(ccnv(ccnv(c0)), cxp(cdm(c0), crn(c0)), cxp(cdm(c0), crn(c0)))
  ssequn1(ccom(cxp(cdm(c0), crn(c0)), c0), ccom(cxp(cdm(c0), crn(c0)), cxp(cdm(c0), crn(c0))))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm trrelsuperrel2dg(class c0, class c1, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(c0 ⊆ c1 ∧(c1 ∘ c1)⊆ c1))
  ⊣ (w0 → c1 =(c0 ⋃(dom(c0)× ran(c0))))
} = {
  jca(w0, c0 ⊆ c1, (c1 ∘ c1)⊆ c1)
  syl5sseqr(c0, c1, (c0 ⋃(dom(c0)× ran(c0))), w0)
  ssun1(c0, (dom(c0)× ran(c0)))
  3sstr4d((c1 ∘ c1), c1, ((dom(c0)× ran(c0))∘(dom(c0)× ran(c0))), (c0 ⋃(dom(c0)× ran(c0))), w0)
  a1i(w0, ((dom(c0)× ran(c0))∘(dom(c0)× ran(c0)))⊆(c0 ⋃(dom(c0)× ran(c0))))
  sstri(((dom(c0)× ran(c0))∘(dom(c0)× ran(c0))), (c0 ⋃(dom(c0)× ran(c0))), (dom(c0)× ran(c0)))
  xptrrel(dom(c0), ran(c0))
  ssun2((dom(c0)× ran(c0)), c0)
  syl6eq((c1 ∘ c1), ((dom(c0)× ran(c0))∘(dom(c0)× ran(c0))), ((c0 ⋃(dom(c0)× ran(c0)))∘(c0 ⋃(dom(c0)× ran(c0)))), w0)
  coeq12d(c1, c1, (c0 ⋃(dom(c0)× ran(c0))), (c0 ⋃(dom(c0)× ran(c0))), w0)
  eqtri(((c0 ⋃(dom(c0)× ran(c0)))∘(c0 ⋃(dom(c0)× ran(c0)))), ((dom(c0)× ran(c0))∘(dom(c0)× ran(c0))), ((dom(c0)× ran(c0))∘(c0 ⋃(dom(c0)× ran(c0)))))
